body:
she killed nayuta who i guess was leading the molester demons. this is a continuation of shin kaguya 1 where she exorcised a demon in this guy's house. after that, she was too tired to stand and this guy offered her to stay the night.
this chapter is basically kaguya learning "crap, humans can be evil, too!" can't blame her, personally
What happened to the plot with her fighting demons and all that?
Nicee!! It took really long for a new chapter from crimson. Hopefully this series will get translated soon
